verses.verse: Now concerning the times and seasons, brothers, you don't have any need that I write to you.
For you know perfectly well that the Day of the Lord comes like a thief in the night.
For when they will say, "Peace and safety", then sudden destruction will come on them, like the birth pains of a woman in labor, and they will not escape.
But you, brothers, are not in darkness, so as that day would catch you off guard like a thief.
You are all the children of light and the children of the day; we are not of the night or of darkness.
Therefore let us not sleep like others do, but let us keep watch and be sober.
For those who sleep, sleep at night, and those who are drunk, are drunk at night,
but let us who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith, love, and for a helmet, the hope of salvation.
For God has not appointed us to wrath but to receive salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,
who died for us, so that whether we are alive or sleep [in death], we should live together with him.
Therefore comfort each other, and build each other up, even as you are doing.
We plead with you, brothers, to respect those who work among you, are over you in the Lord, and warn you.
Also to very highly respect them in love because of their work. Be at peace among yourselves.
Now we strongly encourage you, brothers, warn those who are unruly, comfort the faint-hearted, don't let the weak fall, be patient towards all.
See to it that no one pay back evil for evil to anybody, but always follow that which is good both among yourselves and to all.
Rejoice at all times.
Pray without quitting.
Give thanks in everything, for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus for you.
Do not quench the Spirit.
Do not despise prophecies.
Test everything; tightly hold on to what is good.
Stay away from every kind of evil.
May the God of peace, himself, purify you completely, and may you whole spirit, soul, and body be kept blameless up to the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
He who called you is faithful and will also accomplish it.
Brothers, pray for us.
Greet all the brothers with a holy kiss.
I order you by the Lord that this letter be read to all the holy brothers.
May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
